file_content.text: I hope this Gryffin Remus proves of value to us.
I've already sent someone to arrest your rebel. Perhaps my torture droid will help him remember the names of others.
Are you the officer who deals with defectors?
My lord. My poor station is honored by your presence.
Ye-es... though I prefer not to be quite so open about it.
I am Lieutenant Treshoda. High Command has tasked me to learn how these rebels think. As distasteful as that is.
Have you found a candidate? Someone of enough value for the Empire to recruit instead of capture?
A man named Gryffin Remus. He seems to know the rebels well. We should work with him.
Hmm. Let me see anything you have on him.
We could use a man on the inside.
A man named Gryffin Remus. He gave me this intel already. Why don't you torture him for anything else he's got?
He's no one. Just capture him.
I'll send my men to pick him up.
Thank you, my lord. Forgive me the paltry payment for your service. We have a, uh, standard rate....
Thank you. I'll transfer our standard finder's fee to your accounts.
The sooner these rebels are all caged, the better.
